channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Your Robot Carer Can Help
item.description: As the population ages, opportunities to complement caregivers with AI and robotics abound.

item.title: NYT Journos Accusing Trump Of ‘Perfidy’ Have No Idea What They’re Talking About
item.description: Factual circumstances reported by the Times do not prove that perfidy was committed, even if the correct criteria had been articulated.

item.title: Built to last: governance for multigenerational family businesses
item.description: When starting a company, nimble decision-making and founder-led intuition are often hallmarks of success. More structure is needed with complexity.

item.title: Why AI’s greatest challenge is leadership, not innovation
